knimeNode.name: String to Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts the given base 64 encoded string back into the original table format.

fullDescription.intro: Converts the given string (created by the Table to String node) back into the original table format.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the string to convert back to a table (optional).
Select the variable containing the string to convert back to a table (optional).

ports.inPort: The string to convert back to the original table format.
ports.outPort: The original table format contained within the string.
